name: Rubicon 2018
description: ‘Renowned Bordeaux flagship Cabernet-based, 67% in 2018 with Merlot, Cabernet Franc, and Petit Verdot partners. Enticing perfumed layers, elegantly concentrated plush, ripe fruit hint at future complexity; still unformed, like 2017 (5 stars, 95 pts) tightly sheathed by dense tannins. 56% new oak.’ - Platter’s SA Wine Guide 2022, 4.5☆ (93/100)      The wines will continue to be cellared at the Meerlust vintage cellar until maturity (estimated 2028) or withdrawal. Rubicon is not produced every year. If a vintage is not produced, the NFT will include the next vintage, to total 50 consecutive vintages
